item.title: Portable Oxygen Dispensing Unit – (Bottle and Mask)

remarks.para: Any in excess of those required by FAR may be unserviceable or missing provided:

numlitem.para: Required distribution of serviceable bottles is maintained throughout aircraft, and
Bottles not properly serviced are replaced, serviced, or removed at next available maintenance facility.
Do not use lavatory above 10,000 feet MSL if portable O2 bottle is unserviceable.
Remove the unserviceable unit from the aircraft and placard lavatory door, "DO NOT USE ABOVE 10,000 FEET" due to lack of serviceable oxygen and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
